actions.name: Skill Link
actions.description: Effect: The user's [X-Strike] attacks with X<5 gain [Danger Close], and those that have X>=5 have their hit calculation changed to "4+d(X-4)".

system.description: Effect: The user's [X-Strike] attacks with X<5 gain [Danger Close], and those that have X>=5 have their hit calculation changed to "4+d(X-4)".
